It was something that had happened again and again across time and would continue to happen moving into the future to subsequent descendents of this person so I could build a kind of Lovecraft mythology that was expanding in both directions from what we thought of as just a single occurrence.

On one level they've expanded because I realized that the original book was kind of about a single psychotic episode in one man's life and I wanted to expand that so it wasn't just a single occurrence.
